complaint.description: The customer missed a debit order and made arrangements for another one, but Vodacom blocked their numbers without trying to debit the account or contacting them. The customer has been unable to reach Vodacom's call center, chatbot, or online chat for assistance.
complaint.suggestion: Vodacom should improve their customer service by ensuring prompt and effective communication with customers, addressing issues in a timely manner, and providing alternative channels for support.

meta.review_title: The worst customer care and call center
meta.review_content:
I missed a debit order in December and made arrangement for another debit to go off on the 26th of December. Vodacom then just blocked my numbers on the 26th without even trying to debit my account or contacting me. I then called and arranged ANOTHER debit order which did actually go off on the 28th of December. 

It is now the 4th of January and my lines are still blocked. Vodacom's call center does not answer phones, Kept on hold for 1 hour 15 mins until I gave up. I have left 2 messages to call me back. Their chatbot does not respond, their online chat is offline. What is going on over there?

I cannot make any other calls other than 135 (which they do not answer)

It is my last resort to leave a review on hellopeter as I don't know what else to do.
